mapper.select: select id, division_account_id, car_model_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_division_account_car_model where id = #{id}
select car_model_id from t_division_account_car_model where division_account_id = #{id}
select division_account_id from t_division_account_car_model where car_model_id= #{carModelId}

select dac.division_account_id from t_division_account_config dac left join t_division_account_car_model dacm on dac.id=dacm.division_account_id where dac.tenant_id= #{tenantId} and dac.status=0 and dac.del_flag=0
select id, division_account_id, car_model_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_division_account_car_model limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_division_account_car_model(division_account_id, car_model_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{divisionAccountId}, #{carModelId}, #{tenantId}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_division_account_car_model(division_account_id, car_model_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.divisionAccountId}, #{item.carModelId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_division_account_car_model
division_account_id = #{divisionAccountId},
car_model_id = #{carModelId},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
